#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	unsigned int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		unsigned long n, no4=0;
		scanf("%ld", &n);
		int i = n/7;
		/*switch( n%7 )
		{
			case 0:
			case 4:
				no4 = 7*i;
				break;
			case 1:
			case 5:
				no4 = 7*(i-1);
				break;
			case 2:
			case 6:
				no4 = 7*(i-2);
				break;
			default:
				no4 = 7*(i-3);
				break;
		}*/
		bool flag=false;
		for(int j=i; j>=0; j--)
		{
			int r = n - j*7;
			if( r%4==0 )
			{
				printf("%ld \n", j*7);
				flag = true;
				break;
			}
		}
		if( flag==false )
			printf("-1 \n");
		
	}
	return 0;
}
